childMdx.excerpt: No-one wrote this dedication. No-one will ever read it.   Truth took me and I said: You are my teacher.   One real laugh returned, resigned…
The path by that oak tree will take you straight up the mountain to a secret crystal garden which shows itself to unwanting souls who have…
Still a foolish scholar, still a naked man bare before the gaze, now gifted simplicity.   None of this matters: reality is nothing like a…
All my time spent, no time at all lost, in singularity:   this many-folded matrix, clear manifest of every message.   What touched one heart…
